channel.title: Nu Fkn Tekst
channel.description: Every time I right click, it shows in empty box with a drop shadow. I have to run my mouse over it to see all of it a few times. It's really fucking annoying when I'm trying to use PhotoShop or Flash Pro, when I'm working fast paced to finish, constantly flinging my mouse and stuff. Why is this happening? I'm no longer using Blinds, and I believe I have Windows Effects turned off.

item.title: Nu Fkn Tekst
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Hmm, this was a very annoying problem to me. I thought it was a problem, miraculously one day it stopped about when I cleaned my hard drive. I believe this is LAG.
Err, that’s how it happened, I may have done a few options when I was disk cleaning, but my only guess is lag xD

Read full topic
